title: WTT:  T213-1 HOFer for T213-1 HOFer
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTT:  T213-1 HOFer for T213-1 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hi guys.  I'm looking to trade this one for another HOFer from the same set.  Please shoot me a message if you have any interest.  

This card is not for sale.  The only other things I might trade it for are 1924 Diaz Cigs HOFers, T206 rare back HOFers (Brown Hindu and tougher), T207 Napoleon back HOFers, e107 HOFers

Awesome card, Luke. I was the underbidder, and thought you were the consignor. I have 2 raw ones. One is better, and one is very poor.

T213-1 was my main focus for 2 decades, but they don't ever come up for sale anymore. Like that Kink's song, or the great Van Halen cover, "Where have all the good times gone?"

Hi Rob.  I didn't notice your reply until now.  Yeah they are impossible.  Your collection is absolutely ridiculous considering how rarely they show up these days.  I figured even though I already have Bender, maybe someday I can trade it for one of the other 7 HOFers in the set.

Here is Mr. Bender in a fresh new holder.  Still looking.
